      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Proxima Centauri and the orbits of Pluto, Venus, Mercury and Earth with respect to the Sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Proxima centauri und die Bahnen von Pluto, von 
Venus, von Quecksilber und von Masse in Bezug auf die Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Proxima centauri et les orbites de Pluton, de 
Venus, de mercure et de terre en ce qui concerne le soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Proxima centauri e as órbitas de Pluto, de 
Venus, de mercúrio e de terra com respeito ao sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proxima centauri e le orbite di Pluto, di Venus, 
di mercurio e di terra riguardo al sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Proxima centauri και οι τροχιές pluto, της 
Αφροδίτης, του υδραργύρου και της γης όσον αφορά τον ήλιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Proxima centauri y las órbitas de Pluto, de 
Venus, del mercurio y de la tierra con respecto al sol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows Proxima Centauri with respect to the Sun (top), Pluto's orbit (middle) and Venus, Mercury and Earth moving along their orbits around the Sun (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mercury</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">orbits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pluto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">proxima centauri</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">venus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar systems</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Proxima, das in Bezug auf 
die Bahn der Sonne (Oberseite) centauri ist, Plutos (mittlere) und 
Venus, das Quecksilber und Masse, die entlang ihre Bahnen um die Sonne
(Unterseite) bewegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre Proxima centauri en ce 
qui concerne l'orbite du soleil (dessus), de Pluton (moyenne) et 
Venus, mercure et terre se déplaçant le long de leurs orbites autour
du soleil (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra Proxima centauri com 
respeito à órbita do sol (alto), do Pluto (média) e a Venus, a 
mercúrio e a terra que movem-se ao longo de suas órbitas em torno do
sol (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra Proxima centauri 
riguardo all'orbita del sole (parte superiore), del Pluto (centrale) 
ed a Venus, a mercurio ed a terra che si muovono lungo le loro orbite 
intorno al sole (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει Proxima centauri 
όσον αφορά τον ήλιο (κορυφή), pluto την τροχιά (μέση) και την
Αφροδίτη, τον υδράργυρο και τη γη που κινούνται κατά μήκος των 
τροχιών τους γύρω από τον ήλιο (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra Proxima centauri con 
respecto a la órbita del sol (tapa), de Pluto (media) y a Venus, al 
mercurio y a la tierra que se mueven a lo largo de sus órbitas 
alrededor del sol (fondo).</string>
          </description>
